code: import{useCallback}from'react';import useBombFinance from'./useBombFinance';import useHandleTransactionReceipt from'./useHandleTransactionReceipt';var useZap=function useZap(bank){var bombFinance=useBombFinance();var handleTransactionReceipt=useHandleTransactionReceipt();var handleZap=useCallback(function(zappingToken,tokenName,amount){handleTransactionReceipt(bombFinance.zapIn(zappingToken,tokenName,amount),"Zap ".concat(amount," in ").concat(bank.depositTokenName,"."));},[bank,bombFinance,handleTransactionReceipt]);return{onZap:handleZap};};export default useZap;
